title: Cade2023
author: Cade2023
content: Loan Amount:65€Reason for Taking out a Loan:BillAmount to be repaid:75€Repayment Date:November 6.Bitcoin Address: bc1qm0mzntgvzdnpytkss24n6ur2rkg3yz2dmejqkk

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: You won't have anything without collateral.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: This coming from someone whop claimed that they could afford to get €1800 per week when repaying for a loan. It looks like you aim in this forum is to get a loan and probably exit scamRead this:1. [EDU] The Rule of "No Collateral, No Loan" - IGNORE AT YOUR OWN RISK!2. Lending Board Rules of Engagement - Attention Lenders and Borrowers

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: Even though you are operating a newbie account, it seems it might not be your only account otherwise you would not simply find your way to this forum in order to ask for a loan.  You have made just two posts since creating your account last month and both have been used to ask for a loan.How can you ask for 12500€ last month and then ask for 65€ this month when you already know nobody is going to give you any money?Quote from: Cade2023 on October 19, 2023, 04:32:58 PMLoan Amount:65€Reason for Taking out a Loan:BillAmount to be repaid:75€Repayment Date:November 6.Bitcoin Address: bc1qm0mzntgvzdnpytkss24n6ur2rkg3yz2dmejqkkQuote from: Cade2023 on September 21, 2023, 10:49:22 PMHey i need 12500€ loan I have big collateral but dont want to say it that post (house collateral)8weekPer week payback 1800€ Pm me on telegram or discord if possible cadev5#9919@Cade202211

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on October 19, 2023, 09:02:11 PMThis coming from someone whop claimed that they could afford to get €1800 per week when repaying for a loan.Lol. It's always the people who don't have any money making those claims.OP, you know what you should do? Cancel your phone subscription! I pay less than €10 per month, and I don't need a loan for it.

comments.author: Gideon66
comments.body: Quote from: Cade2023 on October 19, 2023, 04:32:58 PMLoan Amount:65€Reason for Taking out a Loan:BillAmount to be repaid:75€Repayment Date:November 6.Bitcoin Address: bc1qm0mzntgvzdnpytkss24n6ur2rkg3yz2dmejqkkThis is not acceptable here everyone is aware of scams and your account is even a newbie

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: Imagine a newbie using multiple accounts to ask for a loan. Even if 1% of his attempts were successful it would encourage him to keep going.If he was a genuine member looking for a loan he would have made some effort with regards to collateral and asked for a small loan in the beginning. He first asked for 12500€ before trying again with a much more manageable 65€ but it was too late as he had already been marked therefore the thread should be locked.Quote from: Gideon66 on October 22, 2023, 01:02:40 PMThis is not acceptable here everyone is aware of scams and your account is even a newbie

comments.author: condoras
comments.body: It's well known that "newbies" of this kind (aka scammers and low-lifers) create a ton of accounts in order to get something out of nothing.The good thing is that everybody is aware and all their efforts went to waste without harming any member.
